---
title: "Baybayin Data Cleaning"
author: Mariel Pacada
output: pdf_notebook
---

```{r}
files <- list.files(path = "/Users/marielpacada/baybayin-recognition/baybayin-images", 
                    pattern = "*.jpg", full.names=TRUE)
head(files)
```

```{r}
baybayin_labels <- c()
for (i in 1:length(files)) { 
  path <- strsplit(files[i], "-data/")[[1]][2]
  name <- strsplit(path, "-")[[1]][1]
  label <- substr(name, 1, nchar(name) - 5)
  baybayin_labels <- c(baybayin_labels, label)
}
rm(i)
rm(label)
rm(name)
rm(path)

head(baybayin_labels)
tail(baybayin_labels)
```

```{r}
write.csv(baybayin_labels,"/Users/marielpacada/baybayin-recognition/baybayin-labels.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
